CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(Disconnected_Program__c > TODAY(),Disconnected_Program__c < (Today()+45)),
"Disconnecting",
IF( Disconnected_Program__c <= TODAY(), "Inactive", IF( OR( Training_Complete__c > TODAY(), ISBLANK( Training_Complete__c ) ), "Provisioning", IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Parent_Instance__c ) ), "Shared Instance", "Active" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Store Status
